'''Predatory Proliferating Organism''' is a special enemy encountered during Phase 2 of the [[Guardian of Apep's Oasis]] Weekly Boss. One is also encountered earlier during {{Quest|What Shape Does the Self Hold}}.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats|dendro_res=50%|hp_ratio=2.4|hp_type=2|atk_ratio=4|atk_type=2|hide_notes=1}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Predatory Proliferating Organism

|name_1      = Devour
|desc_1      = Enters an enhanced state by consuming a nearby Preliminary Proliferating Organism. While in this state, it will continuously chase down the player while rapidly biting up to 8 times, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. It may also bite once, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
}}
